PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07472019-06-09,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (Medical Device Incident Reporting – Hospitals)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICE REGULATIONS (MEDICAL DEVICE INCIDENT REPORTING – HOSPITALS) in order to improve the quality and increase the quantity of Serious Adverse Drugs Reactions and Medical Device Incident reports, and to expand on the real world evidence used by Health Canada to monitor the safety and effectiveness of therapeutic product, as part of a life-cycle approach to the regulation of such products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0191 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
